Name: Encounter: Tempest
Description:
Before the game begins, search the encounter deck for The Tempest and put it onto the field.
Eye of the Storm - You are in the eye of the storm if there are between 5 and 8 time counters on The Tempest.

Name: The Tempest
Description:
After you play an action, put add 1 ⏳ to The Tempest.
If an action would remove ⏳ from The Tempest, you may add that much ⏳ instead.
If The Tempest would be discarded, players lose the game instead.

Name: Approaching Storm
Description:
When time passes, if there is more than 5 ⏳ on The Tempest, remove ⏳ from it until there is 5 ⏳. 
You can't add ⏳ to The Tempest.

Name: Storm's Maw
Description:
If you are in the eye of the storm, Torrential Harbinger does not attack during the Enemies Attack step of the night.
This enemy gets +X ❤️, where X is the number of ⏳ on The Tempest.

Name: Gale Force Winds
Description: After this card is discarded from the field, remove X ⏳ from The Tempest, where X is the number of cards on your field.

Name: Funnel Clouds
Description: Before time passes, remove 1 ⏳ from The Tempest.

Name: Spout Kraken
Description: After this enemy attacks, remove 1 ⏳ from The Tempest.

Name: Downpour
Description: Remove 2 ⏳ from Tempest and shuffle this event into the Encounter deck unless it contains 5 or fewer cards.

Name: Fog Wraith
Description: This enemy can't be dealt damage unless you are in the eye of the storm.
